o:EventHandlerTargetItem.a:Name: CanCreate
o:EventHandlerTargetItem.a:Creator: RichaneRamsoedit
o:EventHandlerTargetItem.a:HandlerScript:
Function %CanCreate%(parent) 'the parent represents the PivotBusinessRule which communicaties with the model object' 'the default value for the attribute is set to TRUE in the form'
%CanCreate% = False ' If the parent is known return the value of the MDDE configuration extended attribute. If Not (parent Is Nothing) Then %CanCreate% = parent.Model.GetExtendedAttribute("mdde_Feature_BusinessRule_Pivot") End If End Function
